Business Portfolio & Learnings

Three decades of building businesses, serving clients, and learning from both spectacular successes and valuable failures. Here's the authentic story of growth, results, and why experience matters in business strategy.

My Businesses

Three distinct ventures, each born from different motivations and teaching unique lessons about entrepreneurship, persistence, and market understanding.

üìä

Postino

Marketing & Strategy Consultancy

2018 - Present

Building a consultancy that helps UK SMEs navigate growth challenges with data-driven marketing and strategic positioning.

Why I Built This

Recognised the gap between big agency expertise and SME budgets. Wanted to create accessible, results-focused consultancy.

Key Results

40+ SMEs supported, average 180% growth in qualified leads

Lessons Learned

  • Client education is as important as delivery
  • Scalable processes enable quality at volume
  • ADHD hyperfocus becomes a superpower in problem-solving
MarketingStrategyConsultingLeadership
ü•õ

Milk Bottle Tops

Product Innovation & E-commerce

1993 - Present

Reviving nostalgic products with modern sustainability focus. From childhood memory to thriving business spanning three decades.

Why I Built This

Spotted opportunity in nostalgia marketing before it was mainstream. Believed in the power of emotional connection to products.

Key Results

3M+ products sold, consistent profitability across 30+ years

Lessons Learned

  • Long-term thinking trumps quick wins
  • Emotional branding creates lasting customer relationships
  • Simple products can have complex supply chains
E-commerceProductBrandSustainability
üè≠

Glazing Supplies Direct

B2B Manufacturing & Distribution

2015 - Present

UK-made glazing solutions serving 8,000+ professionals. Building trust in a traditional industry through quality and reliability.

Why I Built This

Saw opportunity to modernise a traditional industry with digital-first approach and superior customer service.

Key Results

¬£0-¬£10k/week in 90 days, 8,000+ professional customers

Lessons Learned

  • B2B relationships require different nurturing than B2C
  • Quality reputation takes years to build, seconds to damage
  • Industry expertise matters more than flashy marketing
B2BManufacturingDigital Transformation

Learning from Failures

Not everything succeeded. Here are two ventures that didn't work out as planned, what went wrong, and how these experiences made me a better entrepreneur and consultant.

‚ö†Ô∏è

Abacus Consulting

2016-2017

Ambitious consulting platform attempting to democratise business advice

What Went Wrong

  • √óTried to solve too many problems at once
  • √óUnderestimated the complexity of matchmaking advisors to businesses
  • √óBuilt solution before fully understanding the market

Lessons Learned

  • ‚ÜíFocus beats breadth every time
  • ‚ÜíMarket research isn't the same as market understanding
  • ‚ÜíTechnical solutions need business model validation first

How It Made Me Better

Now I validate every assumption before building. Led to Postino's focused, proven approach.

StrategyMarket ResearchProduct Development
‚ö†Ô∏è

52x11 Training

2017-2018

Cycling training platform combining performance data with coaching

What Went Wrong

  • √óOverestimated demand for premium cycling coaching
  • √óTechnology complexity exceeded budget and timeline
  • √óPersonal passion didn't translate to market demand

Lessons Learned

  • ‚ÜíPassion projects need market validation like any other business
  • ‚ÜíMVP should be genuinely minimal and viable
  • ‚ÜíUser acquisition is often harder than product development

How It Made Me Better

Developed rigorous validation processes. Now use lean methodology for all new ventures.

ProductMarket ValidationLean Startup
